description:
cmd/go: rearrange help for 'go test'
Put the 'go test' flags into 'go help test', so 'go help testflags'
is about the flags for the compiled test binary.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=4369715eb200 ***

cmd/go: rearrange help for 'go test'
Put the 'go test' flags into 'go help test', so 'go help testflags'
is about the flags for the compiled test binary.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5641060

subject: code review 5641060: cmd/go: rearrange help for 'go test'
